entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light overnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
